trans-unit.source: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee definieert u de optionele contract waarin een binding implementeren kunt om op te geven of binnenkomende aanvragen synchroon of asynchroon worden verwerkt door de service.

trans-unit.source: In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: In sommige gevallen kan zijn efficiënter voor een binding om berichten te verwerken met de synchrone <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>methoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> class can optionally implement IBindingRuntimePreferences to indicate to callers that this is preferred.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>klasse kan eventueel IBindingRuntimePreferences om aan te geven voor aanroepers dit voorkeur is geïmplementeerd.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If a binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods.
trans-unit.target: Als u een binding wordt niet geïmplementeerd voor IBindingRuntimePreferences, de [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model-Runtime-laag maakt standaard gebruik van de asynchrone versies van de `Receive` en `Request` methoden.

trans-unit.source: If a binding does implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) or the asynchronous versions (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: Als u een binding wordt geïmplementeerd IBindingRuntimePreferences, de [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model-Runtime-laag controleert de waarde van <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>en die wordt gebruikt om te bepalen of aan te roepen de synchrone versies van deze methoden (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) of de asynchrone versies (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IBindingRuntimePreferences is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods to receive messages from the channel.
trans-unit.target: Als IBindingRuntimePreferences wordt geïmplementeerd door de binding en retourneert `true` van de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>eigenschap, het is raadzaam dat u de synchrone <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>methoden om berichten te ontvangen van het kanaal.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences or returns `false` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: Als de binding wordt niet geïmplementeerd IBindingRuntimePreferences of retourneert `false` van de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>eigenschap, het is raadzaam dat u de asynchrone <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A>en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>methoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented.
trans-unit.target: Ongeacht de waarde die is geretourneerd door de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>eigenschap, alle bindingen verstrekt nog steeds geldig implementaties van de synchrone en asynchrone versies van de `Receive` methoden voor het specifieke kanaaltypen geïmplementeerd.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Zie voor meer informatie over het implementeren van aangepaste kanalen [ontwikkelen kanalen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Haalt een waarde die aangeeft of de binnenkomende aanvragen kunnen worden verwerkt meer efficiënt synchroon of asynchroon.

trans-unit.source: The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously.
trans-unit.target: De standaard Bindingen (meegeleverd system) opgegeven door [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] deze interface hebt geïmplementeerd en in sommige gevallen kunt u de standaardwaarde voor het verwerken van inkomende berichten synchroon overschrijven.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als aanvragen efficiënter synchroon; kunnen worden verwerkt anders<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to handle requests asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>voor het asynchroon verwerken van aanvragen.
